description: Update a time sheet line item equipment requirement.
permissions: Allowed if the user is authorized for the related time sheet line item via delegated policy to the time sheet. Admins are allowed. Non-admin access follows TimeSheetPolicy based on the time sheet subject (e.g., broker members, customer managers, trucker/driver roles, laborer users on labor requirements, or authorized work order roles/assignments).
side_effects: Updating is_primary can synchronize the linked time sheet line item equipment_requirement_id.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one field is required to update. --is-primary must be "true" or "false" when provided. equipment_requirement_id must be unique per time_sheet_line_item_id. Time sheet line item must belong to a time sheet with a LaborRequirement subject. equipment_requirement must be on the same job_production_plan as the labor requirement.
